summary: BuildRequest contains no explicit requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff modifies backend/main.mo and project_state.json, but there is no evidence of a production/public publish workflow implementation or slug handling changes. Changes to backend state appear unrequested given the request scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified backend actor by adding/altering variables (immutableVar and mutableVar) without any stated requirement to change backend behavior for publishing.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is about publishing the current site to production/public with constraints, and explicitly lists no new backend features/changes; the diff shows backend code changes unrelated to publishing/slug validation.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project_state.json existing_features/metadata (including references to REQ-1..REQ-5) despite the BuildRequest stating there are no requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: These metadata/feature entries are not requested in the BuildRequest and may conflict with the stated 'Requirements: none'.
